creator: 0xc8ed64c1fdaaaead7bc196dee74607fc5fd6db77
name: KobeDAO
description:
KobeDAO is a Salute to KOBE BRYENT.
The KobeDAO aims to raise USD in exchange for $KobeDAO governance tokens, which are used to airdrop to donors and buy Kobe-related memorabilia. And next step,KobeNFT will be made and which will be airdropped to donors, and the rest for sale in the market.The funding will be used to support various activities related to commemorating Kobe around the world and arrange 'KOBE' basketball game all over the world. What's more, we will cooperate with NBATopShot and NBA to promote KobeDAO.
